mods.abstract: (This lot was originally owned by a Fuller but was transferred to William & Cora White); 15; a; 21; 10.0x25.0x; Cooley, William Franklin 1915-1981; Cooley, Frances 1910-1983; Cooley, Infant -1940; Fagan, Wesley D. 1888-1922; Fuller, Amanda 1848-1918; Fuller, Joseph H. 1841-1915; Townes, William Rhea 1933-1937; White, Cora B. 1884-1977; White, William C. 1875-1931; Willis, Infant -1893; Cooley, WM. Douglas 1948-1991 cremated
